thoughts.text: The present moment is the only thing that exists.
Live your own life. You can only be you.
There’s a lot of correct ways of living life. Find your own way of living your life.
In an argument between two people, usually the two people are right.
You can’t validate what has never been validated for you.
A lot of the things we want are one of the other side of cringe.
We will all die someday. Don’t take yourself too seriously.
Fear is the enemy.
Life is long.
Say no a lot.
Design makes the world a better place.
Design is an exercise of intention.
Design is about ‘how’ you do things.
Good design is about removing excess.
Everything in the world is designed.
High agency + taste are the main two skills you need to hone and develop to succeed in the age of AI.
Happiness is found inside.
Happiness is peace in motion.
Peace is the absence of desire.
You should only desire a few things at once.
Emotional attachment to materialistic things is dangerous. Everything material is impermanent.
The most important decision you’ll make in your life is who you marry and who will be the person you’ll start a family with.
